metadata.title: Can Quad SPI flash memory and Octal-SPI RAM be connected to the RZ/A3UL?

sections.content:
Question:
Can Quad SPI flash memory and Octal-SPI RAM be connected to the RZ/A3UL?
Answer:
The SPI Multi I/O BUS controller (QSPI connection controller) and Octal-SPI memory controller (connects Octal-SPI RAM) of the RZ/A3UL are exclusive control due to the pin configuration so they cannot be used at the same time. Consequently, when connecting QSPI flash memory, connect DDR3L/4 memory as the RAM memory.
Suitable Products
RZ/A3UL
